Experience the reviving goodness of Dove\u2019s exclusive micro moisture serum and fibre actives as you lather this Dryness Care Shampoo onto your locks.

\r\n\tThe micro moisture serum penetrates deep into your hair shafts and injects moisture to your locks to keep them soft and supple. You don\u2019t have to worry if your hair would go back to its damaged condition after you stop using this Dryness Care Shampoo as your locks are left feeling stronger and more resilient after continuous use. Those with an active lifestyle can skip that conditioning routine after shampooing their locks with this moisturizing Dove Shampoo. column20:
combine shampooing and conditioning in one gloriously fulfilling hair wash experience with this Dryness Care Shampoo.

Directions for Use

column12:
'desc': [u'

Dove Damage Therapy Color Rescue Shampoo (375 ml) Price: Rs.220

Coloring your hair can lead to serious damage owing to the harsh chemicals present in hair color. Don’t let the worry of damaged hair keep you from trying out different hair colors. Dove Damage Therapy Color Rescue Shampoo is a true savior for everyone with color treated hair.

This Color Rescue Shampoo is a part of Dove’s Damage Therapy range that addresses different areas of hair care. Hair that has been damaged is prone to lose color sooner than healthy hair. Suitable for use on all hair types
column13:
this Color Rescue Shampoo gently cleanses your hair while maintaining the vibrancy and shine of color treated hair. The Color Rescue Shampoo contains Dove’s exclusive Fiber Actives and Micro Moisture Serum. Fiber Actives help reconstruct hair that has been damaged while the Micro Moisture Serum infuses your hair with nutrients to make it look glossy. Bring out the vibrancy and shine of color treated tresses with Dove Damage Therapy Color Rescue Shampoo.\xa0

Directions for Use

  • Apply Dove Color Rescue Shampoo to wet hair.
  • Lather well and gently massage using your fingertips.
  • Rinse off thoroughly.

column12:
'desc': [u'

Dove Hair Fall Rescue Treatment Mask (200 ml) Price: Rs.215

Dove Intensive Hair Fall Rescue Mask has been infused with Fiber Actives and Vita-Protein Complex. This hair mask can be used to revive your damaged hair. This advanced care therapy from Dove gets absorbed into the hair and it provides deep conditioning. The Fiber Actives and Vita-Protein Complex will help in bonding the proteins to your hair strands which in turn will fortify the hair and make them strong. This will reduce hair fall and improve your hair’s luster and texture. This fast acting formula will melt into the hair and enrich the core of the hair shaft and boost the strength of the roots that will fix the hair strands firmly to their base. You can use this Dove Hair Therapy - Hair Fall Rescue Treatment Mask once every week and make it a mandatory part of your haircare regime.

Directions to Use

• Wash and drain your hair of excess water.
• Apply a palmful of the Dove Intensive Hair Fall Rescue Mask and massage it into your hair starting from the middle to the ends.
• Leave this on your hair for at least three to four minutes and then rinse it off thoroughly.
